au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=14m_central_apx15
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(13200,0) # Drive guide to g2 driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g2) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 15 mm sics.drive('apx', -125) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39.5, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(180)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39.5, 0) driveBsz(254)
